segments.text: Mike ! What's going on , man ! Long time no see !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , Pat ! Yeah , I haven ’ t seen you in ages ! How is going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Things doing great ! It ’ s funny running into you like this . Smell well , just last week I ran into Matt as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He ’ s doing well . We went out for a couple of beers and the funniest thing happened .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we were talking and catching up on what we ’ Ve been doing , talking about work and family , when all of a sudden , Matt saw a mouse run under his chair and he completely lost it ! He started freaking out , and screaming ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , and the funniest thing was , that he jumped on to his chair and started shrieking like a girl . You had to be there ! Everyone was staring and laughing ... it was hilarious !
segments.speaker: S1
